title: ¿Y nuestro "Bard to School bundle"?

embed.description: Pick up the Bard To School bundle in the League of Legends store, featuring Bard, Bard Bard skin, and the Bardnik icon for 30% off! BWONG! That's the sound Bard makes! This bundle is only available from August 25-27! Click here for more info: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/bard-school-bundle Bard collectible figure available from the Riot Merch Store: https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/figures/bard-figure.html Animation by TopSpinTheFuzzy https://www.youtube.com/user/TopSpinTheFuzzy Bard!

body: _¿Por qué no tenemos en nuestra región paquete de Bard? Alguien que nos explique, estamos dentro de la fecha... Amo esa skin e ícono_ {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: no pude comprar el icono en mayo :(
Almenos pongan el icono para comprar, no es mucho pedir{{item:3070}}
somos las, les valemos un pico a riot
